mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (email, codeId, title, content, imageUrl) VALUES(#{email}, #{codeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE boardId = #{boardId} and email = #{email}
mapper.select:
SELECT b.*, l.name, u.gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, curdate()) as age FROM board b inner join location l ON b.codeId = l.codeId inner join user u on b.email = u.email WHERE l.name = #{location}
AND gender IN
#{gender}
AND (
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 10 AND 19
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 20 AND 29
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 30 AND 39
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 40 AND 49
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 50 AND 59
TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.birthdate, CURDATE()) >= 60
)
AND createdDate >= STR_TO_DATE(#{period}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
